\)

")

Bash(python3 -c "
import urllib.request, json

data = json.dumps\({''email'': ''adrianemedinam@gmail.com'', ''password'': ''1233456!''}\).encode\(\)
req = urllib.request.Request\(
    ''https://lfvlgpwubzetrujvpjjp.supabase.co/auth/v1/token?grant_type=password'',
    data=data,
    headers={
        ''apikey'': ''eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6ImxmdmxncHd1YnpldHJ1anZwampwIiwicm9sZSI6ImFub24iLCJpYXQiOjE3NjcxOTUyNjMsImV4cCI6MjA4Mjc3MTI2M30.wbW2AKw2sqGFBgsY60DTyHHbgO3R7ys-RwrLVN20BKo'',
        ''Content-Type'': ''application/json''
    }
\)
try:
    resp = urllib.request.urlopen\(req\)
    result = json.loads\(resp.read\(\)\)
    print\(''TOKEN:'', result[''access_token''][:80] + ''...''\)
except urllib.error.HTTPError as e:
    print\(''ERROR:'', e.code, e.read\(\).decode\(\)\)
")

import urllib.request, json

data = json.dumps\({''email'': ''adrianemedinam@gmail.com'', ''password'': ''1233456!''}\).encode\(\)
req = urllib.request.Request\(
    ''https://lfvlgpwubzetrujvpjjp.supabase.co/auth/v1/token?grant_type=password'',
    data=data,
    headers={
        ''apikey'': ''sb_publishable_89sC0w_aBlmWSZQ8imjPzQ_bWLNAw-M'',
        ''Content-Type'': ''application/json''
    }
\)
try:
    resp = urllib.request.urlopen\(req\)
    result = json.loads\(resp.read\(\)\)
    token = result[''access_token'']
    print\(''TOKEN:'', token[:80] + ''...''\)
    print\(''FULL_TOKEN:'', token\)

")
